name: Translation Table
author: AeMonge

sections.description:
This plug-in REQUIRES the qTransalte to work porperlly. It exports all your pages into a Excel2007 (id, titleES, titleEN, contentES, contentEN) separating the languages, so you can transtale your whole site offline.

The actual supported HTML tags are the following (the rest will be striped OUT! ) *
*
*

  • [shorcodes]
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is it only for English / Spanish translations

Yup ^^, if you would like me to improve this plug-in please email: me @ aemonge.com
